metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4383 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The glance-manage db in all versions of HPE Helion Openstack Glance allows deleted image ids to be reassigned, which allows remote authenticated users to cause other users to boot into a modified image without notification of the change.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> There is no fix for this issue, it is a documented shortcoming see upstream advisory for recommended actions

criterions.comment: glance: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
